Comments_List: I learned, to a greater extent, how to work with other people's data structures and how to access big data that can't be simply shared or emailed.
It's a great course that gives hands-on experience of what working with data, and needing to apply various techniques, is like. No overall weaknesses come to mind.
Yes, it provides a good bridge between the idealized world of statistics and data science and the real world use of it.
